entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Bagotville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Bagotville 03:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.0°C
Wind: SSW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow early this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm except 30 cm near the river. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
